recipe_name: Citrus onion, herb and toasted cashew nut salad
author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oils in a wok and gently toast the cashew nuts for 2-3 minutes. Add the spring onions and fry for two minutes.  To serve, mix the herbs together, pile onto a serving plate, top with the cashew nuts and spring onions and squeeze over the lime juice and zest.
ingredients: 2 tsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  100g/3½oz cashew nuts,  3 spring onions, chopped,  large handful each fresh chervil, coriander and mint,  ½ lime, zest and juice
